countryDescription: Listen to the top radio stations from {{country}}
newsDescription: News and information radio stations providing current events, weather updates, and occasional music breaks.
talkDescription: Talk radio stations featuring discussions, interviews, and commentary on various topics.
sportsDescription: Sports radio stations covering live games, sports news, analysis, and commentary.
weatherDescription: Weather information stations providing forecasts and weather-related updates.
comedyDescription: Radio stations featuring comedy shows, stand-up performances, and humorous content.
businessDescription: Business news and financial information radio stations covering markets, economy, and business trends.
bannerTitle: Create your list and enjoy the music!
bannerDescription:
Browse your favorite stations in one list.
Sign up now to personalize your radio experience!
googleSignIn: Sign in with your Google account.
profileHeader: You can edit your information here to keep your experience at Radio Pronto at the best level.

emptyListHeader:
When you add your favorite radio stations, you'll see them here.
It's super easy to create your own broadcast list!

Don't forget to add your favorites to keep your music
with you at all times!
noFavLowerHeader:
You can add radio stations to your favorites by
marking them with a heart.
